title: Pre-order an Amenity for a Room
description: A guest calls in advance of their stay to order a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered strawberries to be in their room upon arrival.

tasks.description: Create a room service order for the requested items, scheduled for the guest's arrival date.
tasks.expected_outcome: A future-dated room service order is created.

tasks.description: Add the charge for the amenity to the guest's reservation folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: The charge is pre-posted to the guest's bill.
